pageTitle: Lost, stolen or faulty Freedom Pass
description: What you should know if your Freedom Pass is faulty, or it's lost or stolen.

texts: {"template":"bulletlist","items":["Online on the \u003ca href=\"http://www.londoncouncils.gov.uk/services/freedom-pass/lost-stolen-or-damaged-pass\"\u003eFreedom Pass website\u003c/a\u003e ","By calling \u003ca href=\"tel:0300 330 1433\"\u003e0300 330 1433\u003c/a\u003e ( \u003ca href=\"/corporate/terms-and-conditions/tfl-call-charges\"\u003ecall charges may apply\u003c/a\u003e )"]}
You will be charged a fee for a replacement.
If you find your lost Freedom Pass, or someone else's, please send it to:
